equipment_slot.description: If specified, checks if the item is equippable in the specified equipment slot. Accepts `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`, or `"offhand"`.
equipment_slot.markdownDescription: If specified, checks if the item is equippable in the specified equipment slot. Accepts `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`, or `"offhand"`.
